translation.en: Please type or select a constituency
On this tab, we describe how this website was constructed and ways to contribute.
translation.zh: 此頁旨在簡介此網站的製作方法，以及參與的途徑。

translation.en: Note, the aim of this app is to provide a convenient site for accessing the Facebook pages of district councillors in Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 此網站旨在提供一站式資源，方便各位尋找和瀏覽香港各區區議員的 Facebook 專頁。

translation.en: This website is not affiliated to any political individuals nor movements.
translation.zh: 此網站並不從屬於任何政治人物或運動。
